channel.title: Rebooted computer :O
channel.description: My friend rebooted his computer and then he can't log into his server! I told him to start the runescape client so he can get java... He did and still did not work! I asked him to check if it says install missing plugins and he installed them... Then he had to restart his computer after he installed em.... It still doesnt work.. It shows a grey screen.

item.title: Rebooted computer :O
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

when your trying to run your server. Do this

Open up the SOURCE folder.
Scroll down until you see RUN or RUNSERVER
Click one of them and wait till it says “Source Name” Online!
Then try to log on using silab or some other client.

Read full topic

item.title: Rebooted computer :O
item.dc:creator: @Saphiroth Saphiroth
item.description:
@Saphiroth wrote:

My friend rebooted his computer and then he can’t log into his server! I told him to start the runescape client so he can get java… He did and still did not work! I asked him to check if it says install missing plugins and he installed them… Then he had to restart his computer after he installed em… It still doesnt work… It shows a grey screen.

Read full topic
